titleStmt.title: Epistles, the second volume: conteining two decads. By Ioseph Hall
Epistles. Vol. 2
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. H[atfield] for Eleazar Edgar & Samuel Macham: & are to be sold at their shops in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified as part of STC 12662a on UMI microfilm reel 596, and as part of 12662 on reel 725.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 596 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 725 (British Library copy).
